title: Canto Bridge
description: The Canto Bridge allows you to bridge assets to Canto from Ethereum or Cosmos Hub.

title: Canto Staking
description: Staking, also known as delegating, is the process of locking up your $CANTO tokens for a period of time to contribute to the security of the Canto network.

title: Canto Lending
description: The Canto Lending Market allows your to supply and borrow assets, including LP tokens received from the Canto LP Interface.

title: Canto Governance
description: The Canto governance page is a place where all users who have staked Canto can vote on proposals.
